summary: Upgrade the ‚ÄúHappy Rose Day, Jansi‚Äù 7-page premium romantic microsite with a global Day/Night mood toggle (CSS/SVG icon, glassmorphism container, soft crossfade theme transition) placed opposite the persistent music toggle, plus add two emotional text lines (one subtle callback within the flow, one closing message on the final/replay page) while preserving the existing dreamy aesthetic, responsiveness, and non-jarring animations.
architectural_notes: Global audio must be user-initiated (no autoplay) and controlled via a persistent play/pause UI visible on all pages.
Background hearts/sparkles must be created with pure CSS/SVG (no emoji hearts, no external heart images).
All animations/transitions: gentle fades/slide-ups, smooth cinematic motion; hover effects are soft glow only; no bounce/shrink effects.
Audio asset to use is `cani.mp4` (not `cani.mp3`); keep the same user-initiated playback + persistent controls requirements.

Add a global Day/Night theme system with smooth animated crossfade; Day is default and Night adjusts background/panels/text plus adds subtle star-like sparkles/particles while keeping hearts softer/slower/dimmer.

Place the Mood toggle opposite the persistent music toggle in the top corner header area; both must remain visible, touch-friendly, and non-overlapping on mobile/desktop; no shrink/bounce hover effects.
known_issues: Audio playback is silent everywhere because the project was configured for `cani.mp3` but the provided file is `cani.mp4`.
